page.title: 05OLD GRANARY CONVERSION
page.content: Mrs Lake converted the old granary outside her home into a Roman Catholic Chapel in 1951. On the ceiling of the chapel there is a pretty arab tent which Mrs Lake bought at a junk auction not realising how much it was worth. The Marquis D'Oizie, a friend of Mrs Lake's recognised what it was worth so they put it on the ceiling of the chapel. There is a pedal organ which is not played anymore but is still in tune. The weekly service is on Saturday at 18.00 and lasts for half an hour and anyone can come. It is called the Chapel of the Annunciation because the Protestant church in the village is called St Mary the Virgin which is the first great mystery and the Annunciation follows.
